content:
For the last several releases we've been compiling Rust with LTO enabled for both LLVM and the Rust code. When we started testing 1.60 we encountered a segfault that's present only in the LTO version of the binaries. After enabling debugging it looks like the issue occurs somewhere during the initialization of session globals during thread creation. I can provide a full stack trace if people would like.

Has anyone encountered similar issues with 1.60?
